text:
E! cancels ‘The Platinum Life’ along with WAGS Miami and WAGS LA There’s currently a blood bath taking place over at the E! network where it’s being reported that a newly placed executive has handed-out walking papers to the cast members of more than a few fan-favorite reality shows upon his arrival. >>

WAGS Atlanta Season 1 Episodes 7 & 8 – ‘Go Your Own Way’ On the season finale, Telli makes a decision that will change her and Deontay’s relationship forever, and Kesha’s priorities shift as CJ deals with a post football injury. Meanwhile, Kierra struggles with her sister’s decision to leave the family business, >>

WAGS Atlanta Season 1 Episode 4 – ‘The Ultimate Ultimatum’ On episode 4, Telli seeks commitment when she and Deontay learn they’re expecting a baby, and Niche pushes Kaylin to pursue the career path she gave up. Meanwhile, Ariel and Kierra clash over the family dance business. alternate link/alternate link >>

WAGS Atlanta Season 1 Episode 3 – ‘Belles in the Bayou’ On episode 3, Kesha and CJ try to work towards getting their relationship back on track, and Niche pushes Andre for a nanny. Meanwhile, former pageant girl Kaylin pursues a hosting career that may be over before it starts. alternate >>

WAGS Atlanta Season 1 Episode 1 – ‘Peaches, Prayers and Players’ On the season premiere, Kaylin deals with shocking news about her pro-baseball player husband, and Kesha enlists the help of her friend Telli to deal with trust issues with her long-term boyfriend, but risks losing the relationship when things don’t go >>

WATCH: Get familiar with the ladies of ‘WAGS Atlanta’ and soak up the new trailer Now that the WAGS franchise has given birth to two successful installments of the show in Miami and LA, they were just given the green light to kick off the Atlanta edition of the series that’s set to slide down >>

WAGS Miami Season 2 Episode 7 – ‘Hurricane Phyllis’ On the season finale, sparks fly when Ashley and Phyllis get into a huge fight the day before her wedding when Phyllis starts to question Ashley’s mothering skills. Meanwhile, Kayla admits to Faven that her marriage is on the rocks, >>

WAGS Miami Season 2 Episode 6 – Double D’s On episode 6, Ashley’s bachelorette party jumps off while Phil has his own night out. Meanwhile, sparks fly when Darnell interviews a new athlete for her podcast, and Claudia agrees to do a photoshoot for Astrid but cancels at the >>

WAGS Miami Season 2 Episode 5 – ‘LA Bachelorette Bound’ On episode 5, things get heated when Astrid finds out that Kayla has been acting two-faced on the low, and sparks fly when the ladies clash during Ashley’s bachelorette weekend in Los Angeles. Meanwhile, Hencha’s opinionated mother comes to town >>

WAGS Miami Season 2 Episode 4 – ‘Hencha’s Revenge’ On episode 4, Hencha gets revenge on Astrid, and Ashley dreads breaking the news to her opinionated soon-to-be mother-in-law that they are having a destination wedding. Meanwhile, Corey is frustrated that Faven’s fashion line is getting in the way of >>

WAGS Miami Season 2 Episode 3 – ‘Dueling Matchmakers’ On episode 3, Hencha goes ballistic when Faven sets up Astrid instead of her, and Darnell realizes that she needs to reprioritize her career. Meanwhile, when Julius signs with a new team, Claudia gets concerned that his new teammates will be >>

WAGS Miami Season 2 Episode 2 – ‘Party Girl’ On episode 2, things get heated when Astrid and Claudia confront Darnell at her birthday bash. Meanwhile, Kayla hooks Astrid up with a baseball player, and Ashley attempts to start planning her upcoming wedding, but gets derailed by Phil’s trip >>

WAGS Miami Season 2 Episode 1 – ‘Bride Wars’ In the Season 2 premiere, Ashley butts heads with her future mother-in-law, Phyllis. Two new married WAGS are brought into the group, but take an instant dislike to one another. Claudia and her rival Ashley attend a big game where >>
title: WAGS Atlanta Season 1 Episode 2
